title: Game Keeps Crashing right after Champion Select.
body:
I've never had this issue before until 2 days ago, but when I tried to play a match I got the "Splat" Window/  the game would crash right after my Champion had been selected. I'm not sure why this kept happening, but no matter how many times I selected "Reconnect", the same thing kept happening. 

So I tried uninstalling and re-installing the game, and it finally worked last night. However when logging back into the game tonight to play a match, the game yet again started to crash. At this point I tried troubleshooting the client itself and I tried clearing my computer to see if it was just the excess clutter in my PC that might have been slowing the computer itself down. However, none of these worked. I checked my Firewall and that didn't seem to be causing the issue either. 

This is getting pretty frustrating so if anyone can help me that would be really great. 

Much appreciated.

Run through the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to fix this up!  Let me know if you have any questions!
